column3: Hmm... You strike me as someone who isn't afraid to get <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>his</If> hands dirty─and I don't mean that as a euphemism. Are you interested in a bit of good old-fashioned hard work?
...But perhaps I'm getting ahead of myself. I am Grigge, one of Sharlayan's gleaners. It is our role to procure materials, samples, knowledge─all you can imagine, and more.

Naturally, 'twould be difficult for any one person to comb the world each time our countrymen ask something of us. Thus did we form a guildship, the better to share information and see the requests we receive to the hands of those best suited to fulfilling them.
Some requests, for instance, are better assigned to those who demonstrate a certain degree of finesse and persistence...and the calluses upon your hands tell me that you are one such person.

I understand that you may feel some trepidation, given the...er, somewhat lax selection process. As you like as not suspect, the Forum would never officially recognize a traveler from another nation as a gleaner.

...Unofficially, however, we're up to our necks in requests as of late, and they're coming in faster than ever before. We'll take any talent we can get─and pay good coin for it─so please, tell me you're interested!
You may now undertake gleaner leves by speaking with Grigge.
Sharlayan or no, we are in dire need of skilled help right now...
In order to undertake this quest, you must be a Disciple of the Hand or the Land of level 80 or above.
